text: Ri Dios xuꞌkoj pa ri komontyox: nabꞌe ri e taqoꞌn, ukabꞌ e kꞌo ri e qꞌalajisal taq tzij, churox e kꞌo ri aꞌjtijabꞌ, kꞌa te riꞌ e kꞌo ri kakibꞌan mayijabꞌal taq jastaq, kꞌa te riꞌ e kꞌo ri yaꞌtal ri sipanik chike keꞌkikunaj yawabꞌibꞌ, xuqujeꞌ e kꞌo ri keꞌkitoꞌ nikꞌaj chik, xuqujeꞌ ri kakichajij jas kabꞌan chukojik ri jastaq, xuqujeꞌ ri ketzijon pa juleꞌ taq tzijobꞌal chik.
